text: Carles Bosch Arisó (1945 - ) is a Spanish journalist and movie director. He was born in Barcelona. He co-directed and co-wrote the Academy Award-nominated movie Balseros (2002). In the 1970s, he worked as a journalist for Interviú. He was a war correspondent for Televisió de Catalunya during the Gulf War. title: Carles Bosch
